players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our community so early in the game. Let us all work together to ensure that justice is served and the culprit is brought to light."
Charlie: "I think we should investigate Bob's body to see if there are any clues."
You: "Let's investigate Bob's body to see if there are any clues. We should also discuss the events of last night and try to piece together what happened."

Diana: "Let us not jump to conclusions based on assumptions or speculation. We should focus on gathering facts and evidence to determine who among us is the culprit. I believe that by working together and sharing information openly, we can uncover the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
